mapper.select: SELECT e.elder_final_service_approval_level as elder_final_service_approval_level, e.elder_id as elder_id, e.elder_name as elder_name, e.elder_disease as elder_disease, e.elder_final_service_status as elder_final_service_status, e.elder_gender, e.elder_birthdate, b.benefit_max_cost as benefit_max_cost FROM elder AS e INNER JOIN benefit_max AS b ON e.elder_final_service_approval_level = b.service_level AND benefit_max_year= date_format(NOW(), '%Y') WHERE center_code= #{centerCode}
select * FROM benefit_cost WHERE benefit_cost_year = ${syear} AND service_time_and_type = #{stype} AND service_category LIKE CONCAT('%', #{scategory})
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employee WHERE center_code=#{centerCode} AND employee_category LIKE CONCAT('%', #{empcategory}, '%')
